description.value: At 20th level, you gain the shapechanger subtype, and you can assume the form of a reptilian humanoid (as @Compendium[pf1.spells.kouqz0pm1xl8xilm]{Alter Self} ) or snake of Diminutive to Huge size (as @Compendium[pf1.spells.w88ddxpu89qcr5c0]{Beast Shape III}) at will. You retain the power of speech and the ability to use somatic spell components when transformed. You also become immune to poison and paralysis. You may use serpentâ€™s fang as often as desired, and you may choose to inflict damage to any ability score.
